entry.def: If you describe something that someone does as ill-advised, you mean that it is not sensible or wise.

example.ex: They would be ill-advised to do this...
example.tran: 他们这样做是不明智的。

example.ex: She said Mr Baker's remarks had been ill-advised...
example.tran: 她说贝克先生的那番话是欠考虑的。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
